patterns: how to learn c language fastly
responses: Learn C in "The C Programming Language" book by Dennis M Ritchie and Brian W Kernighan

patterns: how to learn java language fastly
responses: Learn Java in "Head First Java" book by Kathy Sierra and Bert Bates

patterns: how to learn python language fastly
responses: Learn Python in "Python Crash Course" book by Eric Matthes

patterns: how to learn c++ language fastly
responses: Learn Python in "C++: The Complete Reference" book by Herbert Schildt

patterns: what are the rounds in product company
responses: Rounds will be vary for each companies. But, The commen rounds are, First Aptitude then Programming rounds and the last HR Interview
Placement is a process of assigning a specific job to each of the selected candidates
1.Product 2.Service
Product based companies create products like Oracle, Adobe Photoshop and they usually sell it to as many clients as possible
A service company is a business that generates income by providing services instead of selling physical products
You can learn coding by solving problems in platforms like Hackerrank, Hackerearth, Codechef
Learn and practice aptitude questions in "Quantative Aptitude" book by R.S.Agarwal
